page.title: 13SHOPPING:NORTH NORFOLK
page.content: some women and evening classes are well attended. During winter months thick warm coats or anoraks are essential to keep out the cold east winds, but during the summer months holiday makers wear very brief beachwear whenever possible. {SHOPPING IN NORTH NORFOLK This is an account of shopping trends for an average family of four people. Shopping may be done as little as two times a week, as food can be stored in a refridgerator or a freezer, or as often as each day, using small village stores. The supermarkets referred to are "Fine Fare" or "International" at North Walsham, "Sainsbury's" at Great Yarmouth or Norwich and "Roy's" of Wroxham. Any of these are at least 12 miles from Sea Palling.
